headline: Citi Issues Upward Revision in Price Target for Air Products and Chemicals (APD)
summary: Air Products and Chemicals (NYSE:APD) is one of the best Materials stocks to invest in according to Hedge Funds. On January 21, Citi analyst Patrick Cunningham reaffirmed his Neutral rating on Air Products and Chemicals (NYSE:APD), and revised his target price forecast from $245 to $272. Such a notable revision is backed by his favorable […]

headline: The London Company International Equity Vs. MSCI EAFE FY 2025 Commentary
summary: The International Equity portfolio returned 17.6% gross (16.7% net) year-to-date vs a return of 31.2% for the MSCI EAFE index.
